name: codeql-tools
description: A collection of tools for automating enablement and enforcement of CodeQL

scripts.build: npm run build:parse-build-steps && npm run build:upload-database && npm run build:validate-monorepo-access
scripts.build:parse-build-steps: npx rimraf parse-build-steps/dist && npx @vercel/ncc build parse-build-steps/index.js -o parse-build-steps/dist
scripts.build:upload-database: npx rimraf upload-database/dist && npx @vercel/ncc build upload-database/index.js -o upload-database/dist
scripts.build:validate-monorepo-access: npx rimraf validate-monorepo-access/dist && npx @vercel/ncc build validate-monorepo-access/index.js -o validate-monorepo-access/dist

author: GitHub Expert Services
